headline: Is Abbott Laboratories (ABT) Price Weakness Creating A Potential Opportunity Now?
summary: If you are wondering whether Abbott Laboratories' current share price around US$121.76 offers solid value, you are not alone. This article is here to break that question down in plain terms. The stock has seen a 3.3% decline over the last 7 days and a 3.9% decline over the last 30 days, while its 1 year return sits at 9.3%. This gives you a mix of recent weakness and longer term gains to think about. Recent attention on Abbott often centers on its broad healthcare product portfolio and how...
